price: Uretse uwo Allah azagirira impuhwe. Mu by’ukuri (Allah) ni Umunyacyubahiro bihebuje, Nyirimbabazi.
arabic: إِلَّا مَن رَّحِمَ ٱللَّهُۚ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: illā man raḥima al-lahu innahu huwa al-ʿazīzu al-raḥīmu
